website_summaries.verdict: While it will likely suffice for Assassin's Creed core fans, Unity stumbles throughout and never really finds its footing. Where last year's Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag saw the franchise reach new heights, Unity is somewhat of a sidestep that only shines sporadically.
pros: Assassin's Creed Unity features breathtaking environments and occasional scenes of great heightened action
Its story is compelling and features memorable characters throughout
cons: The game suffers from clunky free-running movement
Climbing and descending aren't as seamless as they are intended to be
Unity suffers from terrible frame rate dips and other graphical weirdness
Compared to Black Flag, Unity feels uninspired and trite

customer_reviews.title: Flawed but worth playing
customer_reviews.text: A good game but doesn't rope you in like AC4 black flag. Paris is beautiful but the world is deadlier and the movement and combat is sticky. You can no longer use NPC's as human shields when someone is shooting at you, so whenever you are being shot at by multiple guys you will very likely die. The emphasis on the companion app and the micro-transactions add a really slimy gimmicky feel to the game but both can be ignored. As flawed as this game is, it's still worth playing and takes the assassins creed franchise in a new direction. Hopefully the games that follow this will be better but it's worth exploring the vast city of paris.
customer_reviews.author: Average Consumer

customer_reviews.title: This one got me really disappointed. It has nice graphics
customer_reviews.text: I bought all AC games so far, for PS3 and now Unity for PS4. This one got me really disappointed. It has nice graphics, indeed. But the gameplay is full of bugs. The actions are, as usual, pretty repetitive. The previously nice multiplayer mode has changed. But, for me, the worse part is that it almost ignores the overall "Assassin's creed" story. For players, like me, who are trying to know what happened to Desmond friends, ignore this game. Even AC Rogue, which also don't talk much about the "present", is better than Unity because it at least talks a little about the predecessors' mythology.
customer_reviews.author: G H T F

customer_reviews.title: Not as great as Assassins Creed Black Flag
customer_reviews.text: The story wasn't hard to follow. I liked the story except for a certain death that wasn't necessary, and the fact that the story for the Modern world with abstergo was kinda mundane. This game apparently wasn't finished when released, but I never experienced the glitches that everyone was facing. Pros: -Story continues after Assassins Creed Rogue -Graphics -New weapons -Better AI Cons: -Can't use the hidden blade as a primary weapon -There's a time limit when using Eagle Vision (I can't stand this) -Modern story was lacking -Unnecessary death of a character -a lot of glitches (faces people) etc.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: The Return of Assassins Creed
customer_reviews.text: Assassins Creed Unity is a lot of fun. It reminds me of the older assassins creed games if you are into that, and you could completely change how your character looks which is fun(outfit and weapons only). The story is somewhat interesting and the combat is challenging, but still good. The bugs have been patched and I have only experienced a problem once in the whole time I played. And for this price I highly reccommened this awesome game!
customer_reviews.author: Dominik H.

customer_reviews.title: This game gets a lot of hate and i honestly dont know why
customer_reviews.text: This game gets a lot of hate and i honestly dont know why, I've asked many people all the time why they dont like this game or talk so much crap about this game and yet not once did i get a legit answer. I've played other AC games and yet i bought this one specifically for the co-op with friends and i actually really enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: This game is super glitchy, but functional
customer_reviews.text: This game is super glitchy, but functional. This is one of Ubisoft's more troubled releases. This was the first time they used an updated version of their new game engine and it led to massive problems. Most have been patched, but not everything is fixed. Still, good story.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Cochran

customer_reviews.title: The glitches are terrible, game movement is slow
customer_reviews.text: The glitches are terrible, game movement is slow. Neither the story nor character are interesting. There's good amount of stuff to do in this game - I'm including all free downloadable content. But I probably won't ever play this game again. The missions where you can play with other people, they are glitchy and and you have no way of communicating with other people who aren't your friends but you are randomly put with. This game just isn't built for missions like that. I'm a big fan of the Assassins Creed games, I've played them all, completed them all. This game was a disappointment...and I hate saying that, but it is.
customer_reviews.author: meaeuler

customer_reviews.title: Assassin's Creed is dead...
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the most disappointing Assassin's Creed game to date. Nothing they promised made it into the game. Even after the bugs have been "fixed" it's still broken. Everyone in France has a British accent. I had such high hopes for this game, but I guess it's over for me. I wish I could go into full detail in this review, but there's so much wrong it'd take me a few hours to write it all out. I give it two stars... because at least I can look awesome with the armor options, which is the only good new addition by the way.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Dorsey

customer_reviews.title: Stop changing combat system
customer_reviews.text: I've played most of assassin's creed series, when I saw this and watched game play tutorials I wanted it.the storyline is nice the graphics are too I like that u purchase and upgrade buildings and customize outfits like sims. I was disappointed because of the fighting controls, they took out counter attacks and blocking is useless. It is very slow to react when blocking I've died a lot because enemies attack at one time and I press block but nothing happens I have to press it multiple times b4 he blocks.
customer_reviews.author: mstoogood4yall

customer_reviews.title: Game Sucks!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This Game Is Cluttered. This Game Lags To Damn Much. The Storyline Of This Game Is Boring. The Characters Of This Game Are Boring. This Game Overall Is Boring. This Game Isn't Even Worth Paying $6 For. I'm Glad I Got Rid Of This Game.
customer_reviews.author: Proud American Nationalist

customer_reviews.title: I've always enjoyed Assassin's Creed games but this one fell a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: I've always enjoyed Assassin's Creed games but this one fell a bit short. Pro's: Graphics. You'll see a nice improvement in graphics compared to the other PS3 Creed games. Con's: Could not get into Arno's storyline. I enjoyed playing previously with Altair, Ezio, Edward and Shay. The controls are frustrating ex: climbing into windows are a problem Co-op missions are forced because some are so hard you really need help from other players.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: They've taken a lot of the good controls and actions and one away with them
customer_reviews.text: It's a joke of a AC game. I've been a fan if the AC franchise since it started and this game is a let down as far as controls are concerned. They've taken a lot of the good controls and actions and one away with them. Also, the maneuvers of Arno are garbage and fighting is sloppy. The map display and the missions aren't very good either.I believe games should be challenging but not tiring. Unity is exhausting. If you want a great AC game, buy Rogue and Origins.
customer_reviews.author: SAA_Gunslinger

customer_reviews.title: The worst addition to the AC family
customer_reviews.text: The worst addition to the AC family. Besides the graphical glitches, frame rate drops, hit detection, blatant lag, etc. the story is highly forgettable and compares nothing to the previous entries in the series. Sadly, I rushed thru this and sold it and pained me in doing so being that it was the first AC game a collector like me has sold but it was just that poorly made where I didn't even want to torture myself and do any side missions.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Sangregorio

customer_reviews.title: Just a terrible game. Very Very glitchy even with the updates ...
customer_reviews.text: Just a terrible game. Very Very glitchy even with the updates from PlayStation. I am a hardcore Assassin's Creed game I have played all the counsel games since the first one on PS3. This one was by far the worst one I have played. My character would get stuck in walls. i would jump and get stuck in the air. I would die from jumping when I didn't push the jump buttons. Just terrible I couldn't even finish the game.
customer_reviews.author: Josue Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Not the best Assassin's Creed
customer_reviews.text: The biggest disappointment with this game is the fact that it is very buggy. The story line could be better, not very captivating. The maps are huge so lots of open world to explore. The graphics are beautiful, nice peek into Paris in the 1700s. The loading time was a bit too long. *SPOILER ALERT* I thoroughly enjoyed the experience of climbing the Eiffel Tower in the game in World War II. Though I enjoyed playing this game, it is not the best Assassin's Creed game especially if you compare it to Black Flag.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Vasquez-Dwarika

customer_reviews.title: This game is beautiful and amazes me at every turn while moving through ...
customer_reviews.text: This game is beautiful and amazes me at every turn while moving through the old city of Paris. The graphics are breathtaking and the immersion into the environment is one of the best features. They must have fixed the bugs that plagued the game when it first launched, because I've not run into any issues. The story is pretty engaging, but I've not played the other games in the series, yet, so I have nothing to compare it to. I'd say for the current price, this game is a steal.
customer_reviews.author: BWhitTop Contributor: Batman

customer_reviews.title: The infamous "no face" bug had it looking like a horror game
customer_reviews.text: This game had so many bugs and glitches that you could make a montage out of it and put it on youtube. The infamous "no face" bug had it looking like a horror game. By the time all the updates came out and fixes were out people have moved on. The story was pretty bad to begin with so there was no fixing that.
customer_reviews.author: I

customer_reviews.title: Great game. To bad for the glitches.
customer_reviews.text: I only give this three stars instead of less because of how captivating this game is, even with the glitchiness. Great graphics, good storyline. Love paris' catacombs. It's great to actually enter and explore not only churches and temples, but houses and palaces, too. So many other missions have kept me occupied for over a month. The multiplayer has so much potential, if it wasn't for the glitches and lag on the internet (brighthouse--yay!). The dead kings side story is great, though.
customer_reviews.author: jaymz

customer_reviews.title: It works now.
customer_reviews.text: At launch this game was a disaster, but 7 months later, it seems Ubisoft has listened to user feedback and fixed most of the issues users were experiencing. The game doesn't crash, less glitches then ever, and i was able to platinum the entire game without any issues. Previously you had to download a companion app to unlock content but that is no longer needed, and there's free DLC you can download. Despite all that people have warned me about this game, it quickly became one of my favorite Assassins Creed games to date
customer_reviews.author: Evan Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Liked it but just another game....
customer_reviews.text: Not bad but honestly didn't think it was better than any of the others. Very short sighted and not a lot of content to it. I liked the design and lay out and a very other features.... but as the overall story not a lot to it. Rogue came out at same time as this for the PS3 and it was better. But after playing Black Flag it is gonna be hard to beat!
customer_reviews.author: Guy W. Seamster

customer_reviews.title: Great game for graphics and gameplay
customer_reviews.text: Graphics are amazing. Story is same as the others basically... Dad died when you're a kid, grow up a troublemaker and end up with the creed. I loved playing it. But i got it a year late and bought syndicate the same time. Syndicate is even better looking and since I unlocked more, theres more to do
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Byrd

customer_reviews.title: Its just a dumbed down version of what makes Assassins Creed great
customer_reviews.text: Hyped to be a new assassins creed, the only thing this game assassinated was their stealth system. Unfortunately, instead of improving their stealth system, they killed it. Its just a dumbed down version of what makes Assassins Creed great, and then we have the micro transactions, totally uncalled for and a ploy to leech more money from people.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: No it is not as good as Black Flag
customer_reviews.text: Don't get what people are complaining about. No it is not as good as Black Flag, but it is still really fun. Have been playing it for about 2 weeks and am still in to it. I got it during a lightning deal for 9.99 and sill think they were giving them away.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Garrett

customer_reviews.title: the graphics are cool and maps are massive
customer_reviews.text: I've played all of the AC games in the franchise, this one falls somewhere in the middle. The most impressive part of the game is just that it is "next gen", the graphics are cool and maps are massive. The gameplay / controls struggled and were frustrating at times. I'm disappointed with the franchise as it keeps getting further and further away from its roots and still has yet to resolve any long term plots. It's just another historic world where you run around and stab people.
customer_reviews.author: SWH

customer_reviews.title: Good Game
customer_reviews.text: The game plays like any other game; I did not have any problems with the game like the reviews say about the game having lots of bugs and glitches. The only thing that it does have would be that the game takes some time to load when you start the missions (for the loading times, it is pretty much the same as Assassin's Creed II), but overall it is a good game.
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo Duenas

customer_reviews.title: An honest review
customer_reviews.text: Here's an honest review. Yes, before the patches this game was unbearable. Now, it's smooth, and has minimal glitches. Online co-op is great, me and my brother play it like crazy. Single player is where it stands out. They've done away with boats(which I'm thankful for), and have streamlined combat and parkour. The graphics are breathtaking, the amount of NPCs are insane. The story can be dull at time, yet they crammed enough side missions and puzzles to make up for it. HONESTLY TRY IT YOURSELF. Also, Elise is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: The representation of Paris is stunning. The game however ...
customer_reviews.text: The representation of Paris is stunning. The game however was rushed to production with serious bugs. There are video glitches that make the screen shimmer and jump. There are times I'm single player when the character become imbedding in a surface freezing all action and requiring a restart. There is a complete stoppage at Sequence 7 part three where the system simple fails to respond to the prompted button push. At that point there is way to progress or escape the sequence. Even restarting brings the player back as if it were groundhog day. Wait to buy. Maybe a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Robert graham

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother - replay Brotherhood instead.
customer_reviews.text: Rushed with imprecise controls and lots of gameplay hangups. I love the French Revolution, but I completely lost interest about a fourth of the way through the story. It's the same amount of stupid fun as the other Assassin's Creed games, but it's definitely not better.
customer_reviews.author: MBH

customer_reviews.title: Only good for co-op
customer_reviews.text: Hindered by glitches and mediocre combat and stealth design, this game is easily the weakest entry in the Assassins Creed series, and I've played most of the others. The combat is buggy, and the stealth mechanics have gotten more annoying than useful. That being said, the games saving grace is its co-op. You and up to 3 friends can easily get lost in the co-op missions and heists, or just running around Paris, for several hours at a time. Short Version: If you wan't another great entry in the Assassin's Creed series, move on. If you want a pretty fun co-op game, this is a good one....now that it's 30 dollars or less.
customer_reviews.author: omega343

customer_reviews.title: good game. like the coop
customer_reviews.text: I loved it! I have been playing it on and off for some months. I finished it for the most part, so now I am going back over it trying to reach 100 percent sync...yeah right. I also haven't done many murder mysteries and other miscellaneous things so catching up on those. Only thing that bothers me about most AC games is that the characters clings to EVERYTHING. It has messed me up on a few missions!
customer_reviews.author: Review Lady-Maam

customer_reviews.title: Boring game
customer_reviews.text: There is something missing in the game. The story line is not as strong as others in the series and it makes it difficult to stay motivated to play. I purchased the game under $10 and I don't think it was worth it. I recommending spending a little more on one of the other titles in the series and enjoying the game.
customer_reviews.author: Ogiee08

customer_reviews.title: I never do reviews but I felt like I had to because of all the really bad ...
customer_reviews.text: I never do reviews but I felt like I had to because of all the really bad ones that kept me from buying the game for a long time. As far as glitches go, if you are not playing online then it's really not an issue. Going through crowds has been my only glitch that was pretty annoying. Otherwise, I really like the game. It's not perfect but it's fun if you love the previous games and I love that we are back in a city without ships. I hate the ships. So take the really dramatic reviews with a grain of salt, it's not as good as the Ezio series but it's still lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Becca M.

customer_reviews.title: Back to AC
customer_reviews.text: I haven't play AC since Revelations and i was kinda bored with AC by that time. I picked it up this for $15 and so far i'm loving it. Story is nothing extraordinary, but gameplay is quite good.
customer_reviews.author: Israel Anaya

customer_reviews.title: ... first one and picking this one up felt almost like the very first minus the fact that the graphics ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't played the Assassins creed series since the first one and picking this one up felt almost like the very first minus the fact that the graphics were better. The story was a little bland for my taste but the combat system was a lot of fun. The only complaint would be that its another ubisoft game which means you will fall through and get stuck in walls/floors. Same goes for Far Cry 4. Takes about 2 or so weeks to reach the Platinum Trophy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Haak

customer_reviews.title: A fun time
customer_reviews.text: Despite all the flack this game got, I really enjoyed my time with it. This is the first console AC in which I completed the story. I'm still trying to collect everything in the game, but I'm loosing patience after spending close to 30 hours in this world. I think I could have played this longer had I played any of the co-op missions, but I did not have anyone to play with so I'll never know. Sure the game has many little glitches, but they are more amusing than annoying. I'd say it's a no-brainer at around $20.
customer_reviews.author: GayJay

customer_reviews.title: Don't waist your time. Glitchy!
customer_reviews.text: Glitchiest game on the planet. I've played every AC game there has been and loves everyone of them. Never had an issue. Never had a glitch. Patiently awaited this one. Played it. Constantly have to restart my game, mission, and PS4. Googled it, appearantly it's pretty common. Shame on you Ubisoft, hope Syndicate is better.
customer_reviews.author: RA

customer_reviews.title: Decent game
customer_reviews.text: A decent assassins creed game. Worth getting if your a fan of the series. Arrived quickly and in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: JustSaiyan1997

customer_reviews.title: General Meh-fest
customer_reviews.text: If you install the 6 GB update, then the game becomes relatively playable at least offline. There are still a few bugs. The game should have been complete at release to the point where only a few very minor bugs, but I guess releasing an incomplete game is more of an aesthetic choice. The story seems kind of short for Assassin's Creed, though not nearly as short as AC Rogue. Visually, a very pleasing game. Though, it does appear that a lot of work went into the viduals and not enough work went into the gameplay itself. Climbing/movement on rooftops seems to over compensate too much. Combat system is rather lousy. Overall, just an average game.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Hastings

customer_reviews.title: Causes system to heat up
customer_reviews.text: Makes my system run super hot and makes the PS4 kick the fan up to max and sound like a vacuum is running, I'm scared to continue playing it do to the fact game consoles and thermal paste have been such a big issue and not really improved upon even on 4th gen consoles. The game is fun as heck anf great to play once you get past the giant update and huge download of its free extra content, but like I said, causes system to run super hot.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Could be a pretty decent game
customer_reviews.text: Bugged galore, but that is more of an Ubisoft problem then Amazons. The Parisian setting is quite stunning though - beautifulll rendered, with more parkour-skills and open-homes to traverse through. Could be a pretty decent game, though the storyline is quite predictable, if not for all the bugs that get frustrating as you keep playing.
customer_reviews.author: Matt C Callaghan

customer_reviews.title: Not terrible
customer_reviews.text: I got it cheap, and well after the game was patched, so I didn't go through the rage of paying 60 bucks for a broken game. I'm actually having a good time with it! Some of the missions are lame, forced co-op is terrible, and collect-a-thon Ubisoft is in full force. The story is incomprehensible and bad. But it's still fun to stab bad guys and Paris looks great. The "Dead Kings" DLC is free as a mea culpa for borking up the launch. It was OK - a but clunkier than the main game, but worth downloading for the weapons. If you can get the game for 10-20 bucks, go for it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Reavey Jr.

customer_reviews.title: more of the same
customer_reviews.text: i've played & owned every AC game since 2...i keep buying them even though most of them are the same thing over and over again. i keep falling for this trap. unity was glitchy, they patched it and for the most part it runs smooth. the frame rate suffers every once in a while like all AC games. the story/gameplay in this one is not very interesting...i never finished it.
customer_reviews.author: gookie

customer_reviews.title: Better than what people whine about
customer_reviews.text: Better than what people whine about. The patches fix all the bugs, almost. There are a few glitches, but not as many as Mass
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I find them to be a nice change.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had the problems with this game that others have mentioned. The only thing I've had problems with is getting co-op to work. I can't speak for multiplayer as I haven't played that feature. I'm more into single player play anyways. I found the control changes to take some getting used to but, now that I'm accustomed to them, I find them to be a nice change.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great graphics, decent history plot, a lot of hours of gameplay, great deal for it's current price
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion this is a good game. Superb graphics, good controls (some ocassional problems but nothing too serious), interesting missions and a lot of hours of gameplay. Maybe when it was lauched had serious bug, but as far as I have played I never found one really important, so I guess the vast majority are already fixed. Right now for the price, I think this game is a very good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Raul David Orozco Solaque

customer_reviews.title: Ubisoft took a step which is too big for them.
customer_reviews.text: The only reason for the three stars is for the graphics, customization, investigative missions and maybe for the storyline, even if I didn't end the whole game. It lags a lot, the running sensibility like the previous assassins' screed doesn't exist anymore,so if you gonna run, you gonna run fast. Fighting skills got a little bit lame and hard as hell. I definitely prefer assassin's creed 4 black flag for everything it has.
customer_reviews.author: Silvaster1

customer_reviews.title: and the story line is pathetic. But it's an Assassin's Creed game
customer_reviews.text: I've played Assassin's Creed I to IV, and this is the weak link in the chain. Mechanics are glitchy, cinematics are awkward, the game flow is static, and the story line is pathetic. But it's an Assassin's Creed game, and there are still some enjoyable experiences.
customer_reviews.author: cembradley

customer_reviews.title: Worst assasins creed game ever
customer_reviews.text: Worst assassins creed game ever, stay away from this game, it's so painful trying finishing the game, forcing yourself to pretend you're having fun playing this game, microtransactions everywhere, awful fighting mechanics, last ubisoft game I spent money on, if you want an awesome new gen assassins creed game buy assasins creed black flag and stay away from this crap
customer_reviews.author: cax

customer_reviews.title: Fun great to play
customer_reviews.text: Love this franchise I have them all for Xbox and ps4 but this was a great game very cool story line
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Same old same old
customer_reviews.text: It's an ok game. It certainly has entertainment value, but there's really nothing here that surpasses previous entries. The expansiveness of the setting is nice, but its singular nature, that is to say, the lack of travel to different areas that would provide a visual counterpoint, detracts from the overall effort put into trying to bring revolutionary france to life. The story is pretty average. Again, nothing new here. It's just another entry into what is becoming a tired franchise. It's entertaining, but nothing to write home about really. Worth it if you pick it up on a sale or something of the sort.
customer_reviews.author: Ignacio Narbona

customer_reviews.title: Skip this one, it's not worthy of "next gen" unless that means bugs and bad gameplay.
customer_reviews.text: The previous Assassin's Creed (Black Flag) was great, but this "next gen" version is not just a step back - but leaps and bounds back. The graphics are barely any better than the last game, the gameplay is super buggy, and the campaign story is not engaging and forgettable after about 10 minutes. It didn't last 2 weeks in my game library before I traded it in. Skip this one, it's not worthy of "next gen" unless that means bugs and bad gameplay.
customer_reviews.author: James R.

customer_reviews.title: Hope you like point collecting
customer_reviews.text: This latest AC entry is pretty mediocre. The worst aspect of the game is the various different types of virtual currency... there are at least 4 types of side points for different things, and it quickly gets confusing. The storyline was just okay. I say bring back the pirate ships and swashbuckling, and leave the stuffy shirts back in Europe!
customer_reviews.author: Zeya

customer_reviews.title: fun game! as someone who enjoys history this game ...
customer_reviews.text: fun game! as someone who enjoys history this game was perfect. hours of game play with amazing graphics and a good story line leaves little to be desired. as you walk around the by standers will speak in french and it will translate it for you so you also learn a little of the language as you play. being able to do missions with friends online makes the game even more enjoyable because you can share the experience with them
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Moreo

customer_reviews.title: Good game. Still a bit buggy but it is ...
customer_reviews.text: Good game. Still a bit buggy but it is tolerable now. Ubisoft still has a way to go if they plan to use this same system in their newer AC games. The combat system is different than previous games. Instead of Dodge rolling, you now have Parry. But I love the fact you can CUSTOMIZE EVERY PIECE OF YOUR OUTFIT FROM THE LOOKS TO THE COLORS AND CREATE A TRULY UNIQUE LOOK.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Gilliam

customer_reviews.title: Bugs are fixed and the DLC is free
customer_reviews.text: There was an endless stream of people trashing this game for the bugs and glitches (rightly so), but I just want to let anyone interested know that those issues have been corrected and when I played it I encountered no glaring issues or bugs and had a pretty good time. It's certainly not as good as Black Flag or Rogue, but definitely better than Revelations and AC III.
customer_reviews.author: Razzmatazz

customer_reviews.title: This is the worst entry in the Assassin's Creed series
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst entry in the Assassin's Creed series. I've played them all, and this one is beyond the worst. Glitches upon glitches, but that's old news. What the reviews won't tell you, is after you've wasted weeks of your life playing a broken game, you'll get to the final battle, which might be the least impressive sequence I've ever seen in gaming. I only ended up finishing this game out of spite. Skip this one, go pick up Rogue instead, or else Syndicate is amazing. But Unity is the absolute worst.
customer_reviews.author: J. Candela

customer_reviews.title: Coop is fun, something new and exciting to play with friends
customer_reviews.text: This game had a couple bugs at launch, such as falling under the map and whatnot. However, most has been fixed and it should now be an enjoyable game. Coop is fun, something new and exciting to play with friends.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Whyy did I buy it? WHYY??
customer_reviews.text: Whyy did I buy it? WHYY?? All the reviews were telling me not to but I had to buy... I wanted to give this game a try even though it had horrible review, but they were right. I could've dealt with the glitches, but I couldn't handle the story. Their awkward romance and meh story... sigh... I wanted to like this game...
customer_reviews.author: mariam m

customer_reviews.title: Medoicre
customer_reviews.text: The game was pretty good. Not as good as the black flags but still a big fan of assassins creed. Had some bugs and glitches. Wont recommend this if it was expensive but since the price has fallen so much, you can give it a try
customer_reviews.author: Ravi Chowdhury

customer_reviews.title: Broken case
customer_reviews.text: Case came broken. Not as described "Very good condition". Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Rudin

customer_reviews.title: Good game, but could better without online links
customer_reviews.text: I had been playing this game for a while and I really enjoy it! I still don't understand why people were saying this is the worst Assassin's Creed game ever made. The only part that I have with the game is the companion app for phones. I see no reason for one. I'm glad I'm not forced to play online because people get stupid when you do something wrong, in their eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Arnold H.

customer_reviews.title: Patch Fixes Most Graphical Errors
customer_reviews.text: The big patch fixes most of the glitches and issues attributed with this Assassin's Creed game. I bought it for about ten bucks, and have spent a good amount of time (20 hours) on it so far. I love the French Revolution and its attached history, so I am enjoying the game a lot. It's definitely an Assassin's Creed game for a next-gen console, because the graphics are dazzling. I'm inclined to give this full stars because most of the issues have been fixed now. It's hard to regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Pham

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Controls and combat are rather clunky and unresponsive, but the Paris setting is gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: MNgamer

customer_reviews.title: Technical disaster
customer_reviews.text: Can't say much that hasn't already been said. This game had tons of potential but was a complete disaster technically. Even a year after being released this game was still so buggy it was almost unplayable. Too bad because graphically it was phenomenal.
customer_reviews.author: MichaelW

customer_reviews.title: Picked up this title because I love the franchise and it was cheap and limited edition
customer_reviews.text: Picked up this title because I love the franchise and it was cheap and limited edition. Needed something for my ps4 for when i get one. Heard LOTS of bad things about it but im one to try to form my own opinion and see for myself. I played it smart and waited until all the patches were out and when they cut the price. Will rerate once I play.
customer_reviews.author: David Ricketts Acevedo

customer_reviews.title: I was pretty proficient at the controls
customer_reviews.text: After playing Black Flag and AC3, I was pretty proficient at the controls, then this... Wish they would have given the option to revert to the old control layout. Since there are only two ways to travel through Paris, walk or fast travel, it would have been nice to leave the quick walk in there. I don NOT like the idea that I have to spend more money for Uplay to play some of the missions in the base game. Seems they're getting greedy!
customer_reviews.author: Danny Gross

customer_reviews.title: Are you Kidding Me?!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone who bought this horrible game should band together and sue for our money back. This game is HORRIBLE! You can't Control the main characters movements! Super super glitchy. I can't believe the game was released like this!?!? And i was so excited for it after Black Flag (which I loved). DO NOT buy this game. I wouldn't pay $5 for it. Steer clear.
customer_reviews.author: S. klein

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this game only for the experience of Paris ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this game only for the experience of Paris back in the day of Renaissance, so far I am quite impressed with what the developer achieved with the next gen hardward. However 900p and 30 FPS is not promosing and rewarding, I hope they might continuously improve this game and make it adeptable with 1080p + 30FPS.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Yi Yang

customer_reviews.title: IT'S OK definitely give it a chance
customer_reviews.text: I liked it fun beautiful game but i feel like the other games were a bit easier and better for some reason although i loved how it was in paris and all that but i didn't care for the ending thought it would have been so much better for some reason but its still a good story line and game just not as good as the old ones
customer_reviews.author: Mellissa Kolaya

customer_reviews.title: After Bug Fixes,  Very Great Game!!
customer_reviews.text: Overall pretty great game! It's still got a couple minor bugs and glitches that tend to be annoying but nothing worse. 99% of the launch bugs that plauged this game have been ironed out and it looks a lot like what Ubisoft typically puts out, also as an apology for the bumpy launch, the Devs game everyone (including people who haven't even purchased the game) by giving away the first DLC content and it's a moderately sized dlc at nearly 8GB. If you love the assassin's creed series then this game is for you, it's got boatloads of content and is a graphically gorgeous game
customer_reviews.author: Nate Koerner

customer_reviews.title: Worst Assassin's Creed in a While
customer_reviews.text: Worst Assassin's Creed in a while. It's like they phoned this one in and thought everyone would be enthralled with shinier graphics. All the side missions are boring, bland and repeated. I gave it two stars because they've at least squashed the ridiculous bugs that were in the game at release.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Love AC series, but UBI is getty greedy and lazy
customer_reviews.text: Love the series. Hate the companion app nonsense and the fact they try to get you to pay money to unlock gear. It started out with quite a few bugs, but is better now (not perfect). Ran out of story pretty fast. It would have been really awesome if the Co-op aspect worked with the storyline and not just certain co-op enabled missions.
customer_reviews.author: TexasDude

customer_reviews.title: Great Price for Great Game
customer_reviews.text: Awesome game. Lots of different activities had me playing for over 40 hours easy. Very glad I waited for all the patches though, because even then I still came across some gnarly glitches. Ok story compared to all the others AC games.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Patched and functional
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty much fixed at this point. There have been a number of patches, and I haven't had any issues so far. The gameplay is enjoyable. PS4 graphics are beautiful, and the frame rates are solid. My complaint is that it seems so limited now. I loved Black Flag. I loved Rogue. Then this came along. It's a good game. I still play it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: i enjoy this game very much
customer_reviews.text: i enjoy this game very much, though at first i believed it was going to be easy to play, found that to not be the case,still it is very enjoyable and the graphics are great
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Guillory

customer_reviews.title: so many glitches
customer_reviews.text: So I buy a game that advertises coop heavily to come to find out I can't even play coop this game should have not been released yet it is utterly terrible in the amount of problems patching on the fly is not an answer.i don't usually review this harshly but the glitches take away from the value of the game.the only reason this isn't a one star review is because I could get into the defective single player where as some of my friends couldn't get in ,friends who I asked to get ac unity solely for the idea of running around France together.i say wait out the glitches as a whole. head our warnings !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: 6/10 game.
customer_reviews.text: One of Assassin's Creed series. Got it at a bargain price. But the gameplay got really boring. Makes you repeat the same process over and over. Multiplayer is fun, but not much people are playing it now.
customer_reviews.author: BenKaTop Contributor: Clarinets

customer_reviews.title: this was a very beautiful game the game play is great
customer_reviews.text: this was a very beautiful game the game play is great, i only wish they would have given more to the story line, it felt lacking.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, dissatisfied in AC Unity.
customer_reviews.text: Great seller! However I am glad I waited to purchase AC Unity. In my opinion this is the worst game in the series. The AC story has always keep me interested in the step but in Unity I am lost. The story line is not consistent, everything is everywhere. Unity is the reason I purchased my PS4 and now I'm sorta disappointed. The glitches are ok. I can look past glitches, software issues if the game itself was intriging. I am overall disappointed in AC Unity. I will go back to square one in AC black on the PS4.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Not terrible, but I can see why people gave low reviews.
customer_reviews.text: I got it just recently when it was on a huge sale, so I got access to the updated versions. Though I haven't encountered any bugs, the controls are very rigid and the story is alright. Compared to the other stories, and my favorite, Ezio Auditore's, this storyline lacks flavor. Other than that, I've always been an Assassin's Creed fan!
customer_reviews.author: Ziceeman

customer_reviews.title: Bad design, Bad gameplay
customer_reviews.text: You can't get all of the single-player skills by playing through the single-player mode. You're *forced* to play in co-op if you want to fully develop your abilities. That's crap. Plus, the slowdown. It's *sluggish*. Assassin's Creed Black Flag was a heck of a lot of fun. But this followup is flawed design-wise and function-wise. And they force online play on you, like constant advertisements during the game that ruin the immersion. Don't make the mistake I made. I gave it the benefit of the doubt. You should skip it.
customer_reviews.author: JOSHUA PAUL GLOVER

customer_reviews.title: I give four start because the game is good, graphic of Paris are very nice but is ...
customer_reviews.text: I give four start because the game is good , graphic of Paris are very nice but is a lot of bugs, i understand that Ubi soft work on it to fix all this bugs , the story is good but little beat repetitive .Assassins 3 or black flag was much better so if you don't have no ones of them start to buy Assassins 3 .
customer_reviews.author: oliver

customer_reviews.title: Fun to just run around!
customer_reviews.text: The attention to detail payed the game is astonishing. I never get bored, playing, even though I have almost completed it, as it just fun to parkour around Paris with the more diverse parkour options. The story isn't very deep, but there are side missions galore that will enhance the story. The sound and voice-acting is phenomenal: I could hear every raindrop, fiddler, and rejoicing pub around me, and the actors read their lines appropriate emotional tones (if only the script was better). Co-op is especially fun and challenging enough when playing with friends.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Kruse

customer_reviews.title: Broken Game Mechanics
customer_reviews.text: Non-responsive controls and buggy mechanics that will interfere with gameplay often, initial patch will take over 6gb. Gameplay has been watered down since AC3. It's almost like the developers decided to not even bother with testing.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Ashley

customer_reviews.title: A very good game
customer_reviews.text: I love this game!!! It should be more like ac4, but otherwise it's a fun game!!! It's hard to avoid sword blows from enemies and it takes a lot to use your gun. The thing that I don't like is having to purchase skills.You can't pet animals like in previous games and hunt!!! You can't pick up any of your dead enemie's weapons like in ac4( I started with ac4). Besides the problems in this game, I like it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa S. Hochanadel

customer_reviews.title: Boring story
customer_reviews.text: I really like the AC saga, but this game is one of the worst ac games that I've ever played.
customer_reviews.author: David Galli

customer_reviews.title: amazing game
customer_reviews.text: the games was amazing now that every thing is fixed since last update I would say it is awesome . I love this game I finished all the Assassin's Creed games except this one now I am finishing the game. I love the game play, jumping, story line. every thing is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: farzam

customer_reviews.title: Worse Assassin's Creed game I have ever played
customer_reviews.text: Worse Assassin's Creed game I have ever played. What I loved about AC5 was the added Ships, and going on land was just extra. It felt like a whole new game. Now you take away the ships, added more... "realistic" climbing which is more glitchy then ever. I'd return it but I only will keep it so I can beat it and get the story. I've played for three hours and I'm very bored of it already.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M. Reeverts

customer_reviews.title: Great game, this was personally for me as I ...
customer_reviews.text: Great game, this was personally for me as I am a huge fan of the AC series, I've played them all so far. Haven't gotten to far into the game yet but I am pleased and will re-write this if i come into any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: After the patch this game was great. I'm never preordering again though after what happened ...
customer_reviews.text: After the patch this game was great. I'm never preordering again though after what happened with this game. That being said, this game was a lot of fun, they did a great job of adding new elements to gameplay to make it very entertaining. No spoilers, but I did miss having actual gameplay outside of the animus this time. Everything took place within the animus which made me feel like I was missing a big part of the over-arching story of the game. I hope that in the next installment they add something like that back in.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle McCordic

customer_reviews.title: I liked this game but...
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed Assassin's Creed Unity, the gameplay was enjoyable and the missions were challenging but not to a frustrating level. The game has solid graphics and I would have given this game 5 stars if it wasn't for all the glitches throughout the game and a sometimes irritable multiplayer, due to slow loading times.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: I have loved all assassin's creed games but this one had to ...
customer_reviews.text: ubisoft kind of dropped the ball on this one for me. I have loved all assassin's creed games but this one had to much stuff outside the game. you had to do stuff on an iPad app (companion app) and stuff on ubisoft (initiate) just to unlock the chests in the game. that's a turn off to me to have to leave the game to do stuff on the game.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: This is a GREAT GAME! I just started to play it
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT GAME! I just started to play it, so far so good. It has incredible graphics and great story. I think this one its a little bit harder to play compared with the previous games, but it makes it more interesting and challenging. I don't understand why people complains about everything. I think Ubisoft solved major problems with the last patch 5. Enjoy this game, 100% recommended
customer_reviews.author: Csoberanis

customer_reviews.title: ... released but I got it cheap and it's a pretty fun game for my first assassin creed game of ...
customer_reviews.text: just got this game after being a while from being released but I got it cheap and it's a pretty fun game for my first assassin creed game of the series. can't wait for syndicate
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Escobar

customer_reviews.title: nice game plays
customer_reviews.text: Typical Ubisoft game: Gorgeous scenes, interesting side missions, historical background, nice game plays, fine stories, a bit repetitive campaign... This is a game for light gamers, due to its beautiful look and endless NPC. BTW, I didn't found any bugs or glitches while playing, maybe Ubisoft has already fixed those. So let's give them some credits back.
customer_reviews.author: XI Q.

customer_reviews.title: For my son!
customer_reviews.text: Brand New. Delivered quickly! It’s for my son, and he hasn’t had any complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Diam Ond

customer_reviews.title: Great AC experience
customer_reviews.text: Waited until bugs were fixed and was rewarded by another world-class AC title. Gameplay is great, combat is more challenging until later in the game. Graphics are beautiful and running around Paris is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Don't believe all the negativity
customer_reviews.text: I actually love this game. The combat and parkour are at its best and the enemies rating system is great and refreshing. Being able to customize your assassin is great. I did encounter a few glitches but nothing major.
customer_reviews.author: Goldleader

customer_reviews.title: there's almost no bad language and some history & romance here
customer_reviews.text: Compared with IV, there's almost no bad language and some history & romance here, much more enjoyable to me. I patched 2 times, and game crashed a few times, my character got stuck a few times, but didn't lose much of the game progress, I was always able to recover at last checkpoint. So no problem here, thanks for fixing bugs! And extra content 'Dead Kinds' is free to download. Haven't tried multi-player mode.
customer_reviews.author: green_pea

customer_reviews.title: I enjoyed it a lot!
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated on buying this one since many people have complained about the bugs and nature of its gameplay. But as an Assassin's Creed fan, I really had to try it. I actually enjoyed it a lot. Actually, I'm still playing it even though I'm pretty much done with the story. Great co-op features and I haven't experienced any bugs, really. At the price it's at now (got it for $9.99), it's a pretty good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Ron Mariano

product_meta.title: Assassin's Creed Unity Limited Edition - PlayStation 4
product_meta.description: Platform:PlayStation 4| Edition:LimitedAssassin's Creed Unity LE - PS4
feature_bullets: UNIQUE CO-OP EXPERIENCE YOU MUST PLAY TO BELIEVE: In addition to an epic single-player campaign, join with up to three friends online and experience the open world of 18th-century Paris

A RUTHLESS NEW HERO FOR A BRUTAL WORLD: Play as Arno, an entirely new breed of Assassin, and take down your prey with a range of new weapons such as the Phantom Blade, a hidden blade with crossbow capabilities

BRAND-NEW PARKOUR, COMBAT, AND STEALTH GAMEPLAY: Enjoy an unprecedented degree of freedom and control over your Assassin. Full motion control with new parkour mechanics for free running up, across, and down city walls and buildings

DEEP CUSTOMIZATION OF ARNO, THE MASTER ASSASSIN: Craft a unique play style by choosing weapons, gear, outfits, and specialized skills. Mix and match from hundreds of possible combinations and build your stealth, fighting, and navigation abilities
DISCOVER REVOLUTIONARY PARIS, BROUGHT TO LIFE AS NEVER BEFORE: Carve through the stunning full-scale open world city, a feat only made possible through the power of an all-new game engine

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars2,414 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
